…National Era, which chronicled Black  progress throughout the Nation.

Douglass was the first Black reporter admitted to the Capitol press  galleries. From 1871 to 1875, he reported on the House and Senate  action, keeping the African-American community informed during  Reconstruction after the 13th, 14th, and 15th Amendments. He spent  countless hours writing…

…Taiwan.
